What's in a Typical Yoga Session?
A typical yoga class normally starts with a few minutes relaxation. This is so that we can start to let go of our busy day, gather our thoughts and prepare for the yoga practise.

The main body of the class includes exercises to improve breathing, preparation for muscle and joints followed by yoga postures, called asanas.

Asanas help to improve strength, flexibility and balance, and encourage normal function of the internal organs of the body, digestion, circulation and the endocrine system.

The class finishes with relaxation.

Hmmm... Is there such thing as a typical session?
When?
